channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jerome Powell Dismisses Idea of Trump Firing Him
item.description: Jerome H. Powell, the chairman of the central bank, has been a frequent target of the president-elect, who appointed him in 2018.

item.title: Fed cuts rates again as inflation falls and Trump victory shifts economic climate
item.description: “We’re on a path to a more neutral stance,” the Fed chair said. “That has not changed at all. We’re just going to have to see where the data is.”

item.title: Friday Briefing: Biden promises a peaceful transition
item.description: Plus, the readers turning to “healing fiction.”

item.title: European Leaders Meet Amid Trump Victory and Global Uncertainty
item.description: Leaders from across Europe and beyond gathered to discuss the war in Ukraine, immigration and plans for a second Trump presidency.

item.title: Transgender Americans Voice New Anxiety About Trump Agenda
item.description: President-elect Donald J. Trump has promised to “keep men out of women’s sports” and withhold Medicare and Medicaid funding from hospitals that provid...

item.title: Dozens Killed as Israeli Strikes Pound Lebanon, Health Ministry Says
item.description: The deadliest strikes hit the Bekaa Valley, in and around the historic city of Baalbek, overnight.

item.title: Democrats Had a Theory of the Election. They Were Wrong.
item.description: Two columnists argue that the left neglected to hear what Americans were telling them over the past four years.

item.title: How to watch the NFL’s Thursday Night Football Week 10 of the 2024-2025 season live online for free—and without cable

item.title: I went to Harris’s concession speech—here’s what I heard from Black women
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris chose her alma mater Howard University as the site for her speech.

item.title: Putin Lavishes Praise on Trump, Saying Russia Is ‘Open’ to Restored Ties

item.title: ‘Total Nightmare’ as Wildfire Burns Through Southern California Homes

item.title: Trump’s victory reveals secret Republicans: Joe Rogan-obsessed Gen Z men
item.description: Some Gen Zers probably lied about it who they were voting for.

item.title: Fed Chair Powell says he would not leave even if Trump asked him to
item.description: Trump has said he should have a say in setting interest rates.
